item.title: CVE-2024-33692|2024-04-26T12:46:12.902Z -- Satrya -- Smart Recent Posts Widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Satrya Smart Recent Posts Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Smart Recent Posts Widget: from n/a through 1.0.3.
